snippet: The Paris St.-Germain striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic was suspended for four matches after his criticism of a referee last month.
abstract: Paris St-Germain striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic gets four-game suspension for criticizing referee.
lead_paragraph: The Paris St.-Germain striker Zlatan Ibrahimovic was suspended for four matches after his criticism of a referee last month.

headline.main: Ibrahimovic Is Suspended for Four Games
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Soccer; Ibrahimovic Is Suspended
